text: United Federal Party is boycotting the London talks on the Protectorate's future. Said Mr. Nkumbula last night: We want to discuss what to do if the British Government gives in to Sir and the talks fall through: There are bound to be demonstrations. Yesterday Sir Roy's chief aide, Mr. Julius Greenfield, telephoned his chief a report on his talks with Mr. Macmillan at Chequers.
